tool_description: Documents and catalogs physical and digital evidence related to an incident, maintaining proper chain of custody and evidence integrity.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to associate evidence with

evidence_type.description: Type of evidence: physical, digital, photographic, video, audio, document

evidence_description.description: Detailed description of the evidence item

collection_location.description: Specific location where evidence was collected

collector_name.description: Name of person collecting the evidence

collection_method.description: Method used to collect the evidence

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Invalid evidence type: Must be one of [physical, digital, photographic, video, audio, document].
Incomplete evidence documentation: All required fields must be completed for proper chain of custody.
Collection method unclear: Provide specific details about how evidence was gathered.
Storage requirements invalid: Specify appropriate storage conditions for evidence type.
usage: Provide incident_id, evidence_type, evidence_description, collection_location, collector_name, and collection_method. Optionally specify storage_requirements and evidence_condition. Creates evidence record with chain of custody tracking.

evidence_id.description: Unique identifier for this evidence item

chain_of_custody_started.description: Whether chain of custody tracking has begun

evidence_status.description: Current status of the evidence item

storage_location.description: Where the evidence is currently stored
